content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Compare how governments sustain legitimacy in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries with democratic regimes. In your response, do the following:Define legitimacy.Describe how a democratic AP Comparative Government and Politics course country maintains its legitimacy.For the country described in (b) and for one other AP Comparative Government and Politics course country with a democratic regime, describe a similarity of how the governments maintain legitimacy.
